ruleToc.chapterList:
var chapter1=result.replace(/id=["']readerlists["']/g,"id=\"readerlist\""); var x=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select("#more-chapter"); if (String(x)){ var bid=baseUrl.match(/.*read\/(\d+)/)[1]; var page="1"; var headers={"Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8", "Cookie": "history="+bid}; var option; var url2; var data2; var list2=[]; var list3=[]; do{ option = { "method": "POST", "body":"action=list&bid="+bid+"&page="+page, "headers":JSON.stringify(headers) }; url2="https://www.zhaishuyuan.com/api/,"+JSON.stringify(option); data2=java.ajax(url2); page=String(data2).replace(/[\s\S]*\],"page":([^,]+),"count":\d+}/g,"$1"); list2=data2.match(/({"cN":"([\s\S]*?)","uT":"([\s\S]*?)","id":\s*(\d+)\s*})/g); for(a in list2){ t=list2[a].match(/{"cN":"([\s\S]*?)","uT":"([\s\S]*?)","id":\s*(\d+)\s*}/); na=t[1]; ot=t[2]; id=t[3]; list3.push("
  • "+na+""+ot+"
    • "); } }while(parseInt(page)>1); list3=list3.map(a=>a); chapter1=chapter1.replace(//g,String(list3)); } chapter1;     @css:#readerlist a

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>
